description: Try our easy to follow Eton Mess recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Eton mess,Pescatarian,Strawberry,Gluten free,Vegetarian,Raspberry,Christmas leftovers,Leftovers,Summer,Quick & easy dessert
name: Eton Mess Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup extra fresh strawberries, halved (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Place raspberries and sugar in a saucepan over very low heat for 5 minutes until the juices start to flow, then leave to cool.
Transfer to a food processor and purée until smooth. Pass through a sieve, discarding the solids. Place strawberries in a bowl with the purée, cream, yoghurt and meringue.
Fold everything together until just combined. Top with extra fresh fruit and a sprinkle of icing sugar. Serve immediately.
